Title: Due nuove specie italiane del Genere Clavulina
Keywords:
Clavulina alpina, Clavulina etruriae, new species,
Lombardy, Tuscany, Italy, taxonomy
Abstract:
Two new species of the Genus Clavulina are proposed, one
from the alpine area of Lombardy, the other from the hilly area of
Tuscany. The macro- and micro-morphological description and illustration
is accompanied by the ITS phylogenetic tree including both the two
taxonomic novelties and their closest allies.
